title: Deep learning methods for tuberculosis diagnosis from chest radiographs
details: S Sindhu, C Saravanan - Recent Trends in Healthcare Innovation: Proceedings …, 2025
abstract: According to the World Health Organization, Every year, 10 million people fall ill with tuberculosis (TB). Despite being a preventable and curable disease, 1.5 million people die from TB each year–making it the world's top infectious killer. Despite the …
